channel.title: Simple Client Change
channel.description: Okay so my OS is Windows7 and I want to run Exion's Client, unfortunately he only has "run" for (x32) users and I'm running a (x86). When I right click edit on the run and see the code I'm not sure what to put there. Can someone help me?

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

By the way this is in the wrong section, should have been posted in client help section.

try this code or maybe update your java?

@echo off Title Exion Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\PUT YOUR VERSION OF JAVA\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @Hells-History Hells-History
item.description:
@Hells-History wrote:

[quote=“escalation, post:12, topic:406752”]@echo off title Client Start javaw -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar client exit
Found this code in one of my old servers. It should work. It ran for me, I am also running on a 64bit. (x86)…[/quote]
THIS WORKS I JUST TRYED IT!!! THANKS!!! OMG!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

@echo off title Client Start javaw -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar client exit
Found this code in one of my old servers. It should work. It ran for me, I am also running on a 64bit. (x86)…

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

@echo off
Title Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin -d bin src/*.java src/sign/*.java
pause

change the location to you jdk

or try this

@echo off
title Client
cd ./bin/
"C:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Nope

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I either get this or the screen pops up quick with an error and goes away

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Client Change
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

[quote=“escalation, post:8, topic:406752”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=503751.msg3685663#msg3685663 date=1311822081]
Try this


@echo off
title Client
cd ./Class/
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Launcher 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

or

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Launcher 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

First one should work if not try both.
[/quote]

The code he posted did not indicate that there needed to be a directory. cd./Class/
So he would have to remove that part of the code and then try it.
right?[/quote]

Let him try first…

Rare tell me if it works

Read full topic
